lore: For some mysterious reason, there is one thing this little rogue loves more than blood: small, jingling objects. Indeed, it is believed to be able to tell the value of a metal by the sound it makes, and it will not hesitate to attack anyone who carries a sizeable amount of gold coins. The most prestigious jewelry shops commonly employ these creatures as fake detectors.
menagerieDialog: (It gently nuzzles you, which is quite discomforting considering it's a Bat.)
(It tries to nip at anyone who gets too close, including you. So moody!)
(Everett claims this creature can read, which cements your opinion that he is extremely weird.)
(It moves just a little too fast for your liking. It's unsettling.)
(It's fiddling with a piece of lint it stole from your pocket earlier.)
name: Vampire Bat
